name: Parallel Processor
description: Starts parallel processor pipelines, which are merged upon completion.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of these parallelly executed flows to identify in Monitor.

parameters.name: merger
parameters.description: The merger class to be used to merge the results of the processors.

parameters.name: include_original
parameters.description: Merge the other results into the original DataPacket, or not.

parameters.name: send_original
parameters.description: Whether or not to send the original source packet. If set to false, a dummy empty DataPacket is sent. Use with caution.

parameters.name: processors
parameters.description: Each entry is defining a pipeline of processors for which an Enumeratee is built. The results of each is then merged using the merger class.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The ID of the processor to compose first.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: The next processors to be composed. Due to current limitations, if this processor is the first one in the processor flow after start with not exactly one successor, its result is used for merging, ie. no branching is supported.

The next processor to be composed. Due to current limitations, if this processor is the first one in the processor flow after start with not exactly one successor, its result is used for merging, ie. no branching is supported.
